JavaScript

The reason I mention JavaScript is because it is the most widely used programming language on github. Searching for projects with more than 10,000 stars[28] shows 409 JavaScript based projects, the next one down is Python with 117.

Svelte Tutorial

Play Video[30]

Svelte

A bright new JavaScript compiler/framework named Svelte[31] (28.2k github stars) has recently entered the battle area.
Previously Vue.js[32] (154k stars) outcompeted Facebook's React[33] (141k stars).
Svelte injects its code into your programs, whereas Vue.js and React ask you to program their way, learning new functions and strategies.
Svelte offers a framework for building web applications[34], and an approach to building mobile apps[35] as well.
If you are going to start programming, start with Svelte[36].
They offer a fantastic live coding tutorial at https://svelte.dev/tutorial/basics[37]
